생존자 매칭이 너무 오래걸려서 vpn을 써서 일섭으로 가야 빠르개 매칭됨 한섭에서 10분걸려서 매칭잡혀도 한국사람 거의못만나고 중국인들 대다수임 여기가 한섭인지 중섭인지 모르겠음
10분걸려서매칭한번잡히고 겜하고 10분걸려서 매칭잡히는게 지쳐서 킬러를 하면 킬러2~3판당 핵쟁이걸림 핵쟁이를 신고한다? 신고해도 접수되고 처리되는 시간 오래걸림 시발 놈들이 핵을 잡을생각이 없는건지 능력이 부족한건지 신고한지 몇달 지나도 버젓히 활동하는놈들도 있음 이때문에 좆같아서 킬러들 일섭으로 가거나 접음 그떄문에 생존자 매칭도 길어지고 그냥 악순환의 반복임 근 2년동안 이게임 열심히 했지만 이겜은 개선될 여지가 없어보임 그래서 그냥접음 좆같아서

갈수록 살인마 잠수함 패치로 계속 너프시키는 거 누가 모를줄 아나요? 게다가 매칭도 확장으로 잡아와서 mmr은 의미가 없어졌고, 살인마 튜토리얼도 없고, 핵도 엄청 많은데 전혀 제재를 할 생각이 없어 보이네요. 살인마 난이도는 계속 올라가고, 살인마 판정도 나쁘게 잡히게 패치하고, 서버 렉도 심하고, 생존자만 계속 버프하고, 버그는 넘치는데 버그 픽스 보면 고쳤다 한 것도 안 고쳐져있는 경우가 꽤 있으면서 오래된 버그는 고칠 생각을 안하고, 게임 밸런스도 무너트리고, 유저 피드백이라곤 1도 없는 이런 불성실한 게임 회사는 처음보네요. 그렇다고 새로운 컨텐츠가 나오는 것도 아니고 도대체 뭐 하자는 건가요?  게임 1,2년차에는 그럴 수 있다고 봤지만 이렇게 몇년이 지나고도 전혀 대응할 생각을 안하는 것은 이 게임을 살 가치도 할 가치도 없다는 것을 잘 보여줍니다. 만약 지금 환불할 수만 있다면 꼭 하고싶네요.

2018年のハロウィンイベントから始めました。
キラー専です。
それほどうまくはないですが前は余裕で赤帯にいました。
今の環境ですが高ランク帯について言及すると
破滅が変わった今キラーは試合にならないレベルで
爆速で発電機が付き、逃げられてしまいます。
キラーをやるのは時間の無駄なのでやめましょう。
大体相手するのはVCPTや煽ってくるサバイバーばかりでストレスしかたまりません。
キラー奴隷をやりたいドMなかたにこのゲームはお勧めかもしれません。
キラーがどうこう工夫すれば戦えるゲームではなく、ゲームシステム的にもう崩壊しています。

Fun game if you dont take it too seriously. Got a bit of a toxic community but also some real gems of folks in it. You will run into both, avoid the endgame chat and you will be good. Great game. Unique and clever.

This game is pretty much the online version of communism. If there is any aspect of the game that takes thought process, skill, or has any aspect where one player can be better at using it than another by constantly practicing, the devs will rework it. They will change that aspect of the game so that it no longer takes skill so that everyone is equal. No one is better than another.
Their fix to everything is to just slap a timer on it and call it a day. Sabo takes planning, coordination, and prediction to be able to consistently pull off? ADD A COOLDOWN! Billy is the most balanced killer in the game? ADD A COOLDOWN!

If they aren't adding cooldowns to something that no one gave a fuck about in the first place, they are busy coming up with new changes that they will release on PTB, receive negative feedback on, and then release it anyways with no changes.
Here is an example of how a BVHR meeting goes when discussing what to do with their game next:

Community: "Hitboxes don't work."
BVHR: "LETS CHANGE THE MOVEMENT OF SURVIVORS SO THAT THEY LOOK LIKE UNCOOKED SPAGHETTI NOODLES!"
Community: "Matchmaking sucks, the ranking system sucks."
BVHR: "WE NEED BETTER GRAPHICS!"
Community: "There aren't enough objectives in the game or things to do besides gens."
BVHR: "I HAVE A NEW KILLER IDEA! IT'S CALLED THE BOT, IT TAKES NO SKILL TO PLAY AND GOES AGAINST ANYTHING SKILLFUL A SURVIVOR CAN DO!"
Community: "Some of these perks really need a rework."
BVHR: "WE NEED MORE BREAKABLE WALLS!"

Maybe instead, we should donate to the cause of helping blind and deaf patients, since they clearly can't read or listen to any of the feedback that any member of the community has ever provided. The next update, they will probably start rationing out 400,000 bloodpoints and 1,000 shards for the season for each player since they seem to be turning their game into Venezuela's communist party. The only thing they got right is that this is a horror game, but only because the dev's lack of intelligence is actually terrifying.

I have played this game for a long time, and to be honest... it hasn't gotten much better.
The game is super fun to play, and even more fun with friends. But the dev team needs to get their act together and stop putting patches that buff the game in. I won't want my killer to be more powerful just so the survivors complain and then THEY get more powerful, it's a vicious cycle and only a few killers have stayed in it.
Overall the game can be a lot of fun, until you've played long enough to rank past 10 or so, then you're fun is over. The game turns into a slug fest of toxicity and sweat.
I will give the game props for creativity and design though, that's your best in my opinion, devs.

我也算是这个游戏的老玩家,一直都挺喜欢这游戏，但是这个改完版本以后，设计者自己有玩过人类么？？？？你能不能告诉我人类怎么升段？？？？现在在2段上不去，我一局游戏修了2.5 个发电机，溜了屠夫能有队友修2台电机的时间，然后救了2，3 次队友，最后跑出去了，总得分21793，然后一个豆都不升？？？给我保段?????也就是说如果你所有电机修完，屠夫一个人都没砍到的话，如果你想升段，开完门，你还不能跑，必须要刷分才可能，一局升两个豆基本不可能，升一个豆都难，现在的人类四个人，一个人如果做够升段所需的事情得了超多得分，得分最少的那个人跑出去都才能保段，甚至掉段？？？？？？？游戏设计者你可能是脑子抽了，强行想拖游戏节奏，你一局拖得越久，人类越难跑,就算跑出去也不升段，升段最后也没有任何奖励，你告诉我你有什么动力让人类玩家玩下去？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？

Wie erkläre ich euch DbD kurz und knapp… Es gibt 4 Überlebende, die von einem Killer heimgesucht werden! Die 4 Jockels versuchen 5 Generatoren zu reparieren, währenddessen geht der Killer spazieren. Irgendwann hängt euch der Killer euch am Galgen auf um zu zeigen, wer hier der Boss ist, meistens ist der Killer so freundlich und jagt euch, solange bis ihr der erste seid, der Instant stirbt. Da Tunneln auf eine Art und Weise den Killer in einen Kreygasm Status versetzt.. achja am Anfang und am Ende des Spiels gibt es einen Chat worin deine Randoms alias Profis Mates versuchen auf eine unterirdische Sprache dir Mut zuzusprechen wie geil man doch sei! Hoffentlich konnte ich mit diesem Beitrag mehrere Menschen das Herz erwärmen.

Mit freundlichen Grüßen,
Der Asiate aus der Nachbarschaft!

I've been really patient with the devs for a long time. By a long time I mean about 18 months.

I've been excited for new killers along with the chance for them to actually balance things out and sort out things like bugs that haven't been fixed yet along with chronic issues that the devs just refuse to sort out.

As it turns out, I've pretty much lost 1.2k hours of my life in absolute vain.

I'm a killer main, so my problems are coming from this point of view.

Let's go over the main issues with the game. Looping, genrush and body block.

First off, looping. We've all been there. We all got someone running around the pallet to waste the killers time. With windows, it's a much bigger issue than pallets, since you can just destroy those, and there are perks/addons to sort them out quickly. Windows can't be destroyed, and they REALLY cause a gap between the killer and survivor. And the survivors abuse the life out of them and NOTHING can be done to sort it out. Now you could say: "Use legion, use nurse, use bamboozle." Well there's a problem there. Legion can only help with their power, and they can't even down survivors most of the time with frenzy, the survivors would have to be braindead to stick around. Nurse is a VERY difficult killer to play. She's slow, her power's difficult, and obviously most people are terrible with her. Bamboozle only blocks one window at a time. The extra speed helps but otherwise not by much.

Now let's get to my favourite part. Genrush. Holy bajeebus is it BAD!
For those who don't already know what it is, it's when survivors complete generators quickly to a point where it's out of your control. Yeah, there are perks to slow the game down, but every single one of them has a problem. Hex: Ruin makes skill checks reverse generator progress unless you get a great skill check. Unfortunately it can be cleansed and rendered useless. Pop goes the weasel is a perk that gets rid of a large chunk of generator progress. The problem with it is you need to hook somebody for a work, and you only have 30 seconds to use it. And given the problem I mentioned with looping, it's become rare to use. Thanatophobia slows every survivor action down depending on how many survivors are injured. Unfortunately the slowdown is negligable and it can be countered by healing. The only perk that is some level of use to stop this is overcharge, however survivors are able to avoid it by hitting the skill check.

Now for a not-so-serious issue. Body blocking. The name says it all. Thanks to the introduction of mad grit, it's not an issue with carrying someone anymore. However it's most often used when the exists are used. This makes getting that one chance for a kill should everything go to hell, WHICH IT OFTEN DOES, impossible.

With all these issues, the devs "solutions" do almost nothing to sort this out. They introduce perks that only slightly help, however given survivor behavior, ends up worthless.

With all this taken into account, I'm done with this game. Survivor has just gotten repetitive and boring, and killer has just gotten frustrating and feels more like a chore.

I used to love ya game, but it seems like you're a lost cause now. 

I'll probably drop by and play it again every now and then, but I'm highly unlikely to play killer.

Big edit here: Killer isn't as much of a chore anymore. But this game has now gone from unbalanced, to close to unplayable.

Dedicated servers have been out recently, after delays after delays after tests and what not... and it's a disaster.
Since ghost face, lobby times have now been taking an eternity. I've had times where I'd literally sit for half an hour without a match even being found.
Since hallowed catalyst, my connection to the game has descended in to downright AWFUL! On both ends, survivor and killer, randoms, friends and I have been rubberbanding about the map like crazy. There are times where survivors would walk in 1 line/get stuck and it'd be an easy downing... before disappearing off to the other side of the map. There are times where I can't even break a pallet or generator, there are times where the killer would vanish before my god damn eyes mid chase, I could go on and on and on.

Devs, just scrap the dedicated servers entirely, it's a disaster and you people do not have a very good history at fixing your game. Just go back to the killer being the host.
Yeah, listen entitled survivor brats, it's not me cheating. I'm not a lagswitcher and no, it's not my connection. You know damn well that it's the potato dedicated servers.

Bom, eu tenho poucas horas nesse jogo, cerca de 300 ( o que é pouco se você comparar a outros jogadores mais hardcores), ou seja, sou um jogador mais casual e, então, vou analisar com esse olhar, analisando os pontos positivos no jogo e também os negativos. Vai de você se concorda ou não =)

PONTOS POSITIVOS: Dead by Daylight é uma ideia ótima de jogo. Quem diria que colocar um assassino em um mapa matando 4 sobreviventes iria ser tão divertido e mexeria tanto com o emocional. Diversas vezes você irá tomar sustos com a surpresa ou com a perseguição do assassino se você jogar de sobrevivente ou sentir uma plena satisfação em matar todos os sobreviventes. O jogo é tão inovador que inspirou outros jogos de sucesso como o Identity V.

Eu disse tudo aquilo porque SIM, o jogo cumpre o seu papel de imersão e isso é algo que muitos e muitos jogos têm dificuldade em fazer. Outro fator que contribui para a imersão são os cenários. Eles são bonitos e macabros ao mesmo tempo, além disso, eles são bem equilibrados. O método do jogo encontrar mapas é aleatório, mas têm mapas que favorecem os assassinos assim como têm mapas que ajudam os sobreviventes.

O design dos personagens no jogo é bem legal, principalmente o dos killers. Sempre com um ar macabro bem maneiro e os dos sobreviventes é bem comum, como se a pessoa estivesse la por engano (o que condiz com a história).

O jogo em si ASSASSINO X SOBREVIVENTES é bem equilibrado. Claro, você precisa de treino com o assassino que mais gostar ou com os sobreviventes, mas o jogo é balanceado. O assassino têm habilidades bem apelonas mas, se você comparar que ele esta jogando contra 4 e ainda soma a possibilidade desses 4 estunarem ele, driblarem ele e ficarem fazendo ele perder tempo enquanto os outros 3 ou 2 fazem geradores....é algo pra se levar em conta. Tudo é uma questão de quem está jogando aqui. Obviamente que se o killer for ruim ele não mata ninguém ou no máximo 1, mas, se ele for bom, ele pode matar todos tranquilamente e isso vale o mesmo para os sobreviventes.

CONTRAS: No jogo, existe uns atributos chamados perks....esses perks são habilidades "não ativáveis" que você pode trocar de partida em partida. O problema aqui é o desbalanceamento. Existem perks muito bons, seja para assassinos ou sobreviventes, e perks totalmente inúteis, para ambos também. Ou seja, diversas vezes você verá jogadores com praticamente os mesmo perks....isso é um saco porque diminui as possibilidades de gameplay e, por consequência, o jogo acaba ficando mais massante rapidamente.

Outro ponto negativo que eu concordo em partes são as hit boxes meio bugadas. As vezes, o killer "vara" uma parede, pallet ou janela e acaba acertando você. Os desenvolvedores dizem que isso depende da internet do killer que hosteia toda a partida, mas eu duvido que não seja bug também.

Existe também um outro problema que acontece em partes que é a questão de você esperar muito tempo para achar uma partida, principalmente se você é o killer. Claro, isso pode variar com relação ao dia e ao horário, mas mesmo se você resolver jogar de killer em uma sexta-feira a noite terá dificuldades para achar jogadores.

CONCLUSÃO: É um jogo bem legal e divertido! Certamente, você terá muitas horas de diversão e medo nesse jogo. Ele é feito para jogadores mais casuais e não hardcores como muitos na minha opinião. Apesar dos bugs e das demoras nos lobbys é um jogo que vale a pena. A empresa responsável sempre lança conteúdo novo e também se preocupa em arrumar os erros do jogo, o que já é algo bem legal.

Enfim, se você quer jogar algo novo que é uma mistura de cenário competitivo/terror esse é o jogo pra você!

PS: Lembrando aqui que não levei questões como "comunidade tóxica" em conta pois isso varia. Existem sim jogadores tóxicos como em todos os games competitivos assim como existem aqui. Como eu falei, por ser um jogo cujo o foco não é competitivo, você encontrará bem poucos jogadores tóxicos.

Играю в игру больше года. В течение всего этого времени наблюдаю, как сильно игра деградирует. Разработчикам игры абсолютно, простите меня, наср*ть огромной кучей д*рьма на вечные баги, вылеты, поломанные сервера. Зачем что-то исправлять, лучше завезем побольше скинчиков. Народ ведь готов жрать это д*рьмо, еще и платить за него.
 
Очень жесткая система рангов, на красных рангах что выжившие, что маньяки подчиняются тупым законам эмблем. Чинил, спасал, выжил и 0. Почему? Потому что тебе не хватает всего лишь одной клеточки до заветной капельки, ведь у тебя не было времени побегать от маньяка и ты получил бронзу. Маньякам так вообще нужно чуть ли не танцевать под дождем с бубнами, их эмблемы прижимают сильнее.
   
Абсолютно тупые архивы, с заданиями типа "Выживите 2 раза. Нужно пойти за 1 матч". Подвальные задания маньяков - это вообще отдельный шедевр.

Если вы еще не купили эту игру - вы счастливчик. Не рекомендую адекватным людям. Если вы агрошкольник, нытик-стример-лизожоб разрабов или просто любитель острых ощущений - эта игра для вас. 

Если вы имеете какое-никакое пати - все не так плохо, однако соло-игрок каждую вторую катку будет садиться на огромную бутылку Рин.

I have nearly 1,000 hours and was once near the top of the game. I had a review for this before, and the game has changed and made it irrelevant.

I do not recommend Dead by Daylight. This is rare, but the developers have over-developed this game. I love that they have passion for the game and are constantly trying to add new things. But this is not a game for people who play other games. I'm a member of the old guard. I've had this game for a long time and I've seen the game, the meta, everything change. Some of the changes were very good, some, not so much. But what's finally killed off my want to play this game is the constant additions. It seems like every month there's a new killer and survivor, to the point where I have no idea what's going on in the game anymore. There are too many killers, many of whom are too similar to each other. There's too many survivor perks, you can only take four and it feels like there's 400 to choose from.

I don't play because I don't know what's happening in the games that I'm playing. And I don't know what's happening because I don't play. It's a vicious cycle and I feel like the developers need to take a long break and slow things down. It used to be one of my favorite games, one of the ones I played the most. I'm still "good" at it. But I don't have the time to learn who every killer is, what their perks are, what their primary and secondary powers are, and how to counter them. It was difficult enough when Oni was the newest killer.

My point is, there's no way to casually play this game. You either have to devote a ton of time to learning everything and staying up to date with it, or you're going to get tilted because you have no idea how everything works. It's a shame.

Потратил на эту игру 500 рублей, надеясь получить удовольствие от игры, но гейм девелоперы оказались абсолютно умалишенными даунами, которые превратили перспективный проект в кучу зловонных экскриментов. Баланса 0, механники сломаны, огромное количество багов, которые никто фиксить и не собирается, осталось ввести только атомную бомбу маньяку, чтобы по нажатию кнопки все выжившие сами прыгали на крюки. Если кто-то посоветует купить вам эту игру, плюньте ему в лицо. Надеюсь разрабы будут жить долго и счастливо, а меня за этот обзор забанят и скажут, что я оскорбляю разрабов необоснованно. Рот ебал этого казино. PS: Поиграл еще в эту игру, разрабы как были чмырями, так ими и остались. Нахуй оптимизацию, нахуй баланс, лучше добавлять новые аддоны и скинчики, чтобы бабок срубить. Крч тупое говно тупого говна.

1k hours in and I still love this game.... yes it gets so frustrating that I want to punch my screen... but that's the point. It still brings out emotion in me. How many other games can still do that after many years of play?
You will encounter toxic opponents... but that is because people are idiots (you can't blame a game for that!).
There ARE many bugs.... but I don't mind that, it makes things interesting and occasionally funny so who cares!?!
You will have bad games... you will have good games... sometimes you will play like potato... sometimes you will play like a god. That's why I keep coming back!
BUY THIS GAME.... and I will see you in the fog!

Ну что пришло обновление 2.6.0, и играть решительно невозможно, даже не из за багов а из за разной интересной хрени,например хотите вы поиграть за маньяка,раньше вы просто жали кнопочку лобби создавалось и оно за 2-10 минут заполнялось. Теперь вам нужно подождать примерно 5 минут и только после этого лобби будет создано,да вам подкрутят приоритет,но если не дай сущность кто то ливнёт,а кто то ливнёт ибо дбд (где не догадались сделать запрет на выход из нового лобби в минуту) из лобби то +6 минут к ожиданию гарантированно итого вместо старых 2-10 минут около 8-16 минут,то есть на несколько каток меньше...красиво гг разработчики, ладно б у вас были бы выделенные сервера  и спустя ожидание гарантированно кидало в игру но ведь нет у вас всё ещё хост к маньяку, помимо этого выждав это время вполне может весёлая игра не загрузить к примеру 3 сурвов а 4 просто ливнёт ну всё прощайте подношения да и ранг ты не увидишь даже если все ливнут спустя 2 минуты игры,добавить к этому паршивую стабильность и вуаля около 25% игр будут просто выкидываться в помойку тем что кто то не загрузился по вине сервера или крашнулся

Добро пожаловать в мир выделенных серверов поиск за мана по 15 минут, рассинхрон такой что пинаешь сурва а его там уже нет (хит промазав это очень весело ровно как и весело увидеть что моделька сурва за твоей спиной хитбоксом а визуалом перед тобой),куча багов клиента и всё это прекрасно так контрастирует с пофигизмом разрабов. На данный момент красивый ДБД убит, турниры умерли так как постоянства больше нет. Рандом правит балом.
best game ever but I prefer regular tea
这款游戏是个1v4的PVP游戏，1个屠夫追杀4个逃生者，逃生者为了躲避屠夫追杀，需要打开发动机和逃生大门逃脱。而屠夫就是想尽一切手段杀死逃生者。游戏恐怖的气氛代入感非常到位，画风运用大量冷色调恐怖阴森感非常好，配音以及心跳声给人带来紧张的气氛使得游戏很沉浸。 从刚开始的紧张害怕，到300小时上手后，可以用逃生者可以溜屠夫，和屠夫斗智斗勇，逃脱屠夫的追杀还是很有意思的。推荐喜欢恐怖游戏的人玩吧！

Баланса нет, разрабы просекли, как выкачивать деньги из игроков и начали продаваться за 180 рублей, делая читерных манов и не исправляя баги. Я не буду расписывать почему эта игра плохая, просто оставлю отзыв. А  если вас всё-таки интересует почему так, то есть много подробных обзоров. Игра была реально клёвая, но до патча 2.3.0 и скорее всего большего будущего её не ждёт.

J'aime toujours bien le jeu, mais le contenu ajouté est loin mais très loin de l'optimisation attendue pour un jeu de cette envergure.
Une hitbox bien trop permissive à souhait et un framerate pas toujours stable sont deux des plus gros soucis avec entre autre le matchmaking ou le ranking qui reste hasardeux avec notamment la possibilité pour les tueurs comme pour les survivants, d'être de véritables cancers pour les uns comme pour les autres.

Si vous voulez commencer dead by daylight, fuyez ! 
Si vous avez un mauvais pc, fuyez tout autant !

Update: Maintenant, je stagne en rang alors que j'en gagne et des bugs d'affichage et divers bugs bien connus comme les coups à travers les palettes qui handicapent absolument tout, à croire que les bugs sont devenus des features.

Update2: Le système anti-cheat est catastrophique, je pense sérieusement à arrêter de jouer,  j'ai l'impression de voir un fameux film de Tim Burton où plus le jeu vieillit, plus nous arrivons au stade de pré-alpha. 

En bref, je réitère mes propos, ce jeu devient une aberration sur tous les points, course à l'argent je suppose, plus le temps de rendre le jeu... Jouable ?
